channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Fourth death linked to Legionnaires’ disease cluster at New York assisted living facility
item.description: A fourth person has died amid an outbreak of Legionnaires’ disease at an assisted living facility in upstate New York.

item.title: Americans’ inflation-adjusted incomes rebounded to pre-pandemic levels last year
item.description: The inflation-adjusted median income of U.S. households rebounded last year to roughly its 2019 level, overcoming the biggest price spike in four decades to restore most Americans’ purchasing power.

item.title: Labor costs remain high for small businesses, but a report shows wage growth is slowing for some
item.description: Employee wages are one of the biggest costs for small businesses. A new survey found some owners may be seeing a bit of relief when it comes to wages.
